sentence.Network_en: Jamaica's socialist government is adopting US-inspired free market practices.
sentence.Network_cn: 牙买加的社会主义政府正在仿效美国实行自由市场。

sentence.Network_en: It is really not clear just why he became a Socialist.
sentence.Network_cn: 他为何成为社会党人的确切原因实际上还不清楚。

sentence.Network_en: The party in power planned to bulldoze through a full socialist programme.
sentence.Network_cn: 执政党打算强制推行一个全面的社会主义方案。

entry.def: Socialist means based on socialism or relating to socialism.

example.tran: 执政的社会主义党党员

example.ex: ...low-inflation policies practised by the socialist government...
example.tran: 社会主义政府执行的低通货膨胀政策

entry.tran: 社会主义者;社会主义党人
entry.def: A socialist is a person who believes in socialism or who is a member of a socialist party.

example.ex: The French electorate voted out the socialists.
example.tran: 法国大选中社会主义党人落选。

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or promoting or practicing socialism;
2. advocating or following the socialist principles;

auth_sentence.content: Welcome to the People's Socialist Republic of France.
auth_sentence.res_content: Welcome to the People's Socialist Republic of France.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Welcome to the People's Socialist Republic of France.

auth_sentence.content: The resignation ends the socialist government's six-year reign.
auth_sentence.res_content: The resignation ends the socialist government's six-year reign.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The resignation ends the socialist government's six-year reign.

auth_sentence.content: There is also the residue of old socialist dreaming.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is also the residue of old socialist dreaming.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is also the residue of old socialist dreaming.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,表示"信仰者,专家或人",有些也可做形容词

sentences.en: His father was an ardent socialist.
sentences.cn: 他父亲是一个热情的社会主义者。

jushi.chinese: 我们的社会是社会主义社会。

jushi.english: His actions and his socialist principles always accord well.
jushi.chinese: 他的行动和他的社会主义原则总是很一致的。

jushi.english: The right-wing Socialist workers have adopted Julia Green as their representative for the coming election.
jushi.chinese: 社会党的右派党员选朱莉娅·格林为本次选举的代表。
